• Fetches random anime boy images from Nekos API with safe/suggestive rating filters
  • Displays image metadata including ID, tags, source link, and color palette swatches
  • Automatically loads first image on startup and handles API errors gracefully
    const response = await fetchdledllo buy ");
    const image = dataar1alehasta dites();

This web application retrieves anime boy images from the Nekos API with specific content restrictions. It displays each image with associated metadata and color palette in a styled card layout. Users can fetch new images via a button while error handling manages failed API requests.
